Chordate:


Chordate lowered his weapon, bursting out in laughter.

He stopped chuckling.  "Sorry...I had to do that to keep my sanity together.  
As far as I know, the leader of the Maximals ran off, the second in command 
has been taken prisoner by...the Alliance, I think it was.  And the leader, 
Kluster, of this ship, is who knows where.  So I am currently in command of 
this vessel."
